column4: Okay, away from gaming, is there a "safe" way to upgrade things like the Kernel, Gnome, Xorg, Firefox and OOo on my breezy system?
you need all the dapper updates to run the new programs.
linspire is the worst piece of horseshit ever made.
it has no package management, you cant compile, you cant use deb's. its almost the same as windows, it doesnt even have a terminal!
